title: How long does it take to become a naturopathic doctor?
description: Answer (1 of 3): Well, first off, you need education. And that depends on where you are in the world! For instance, if you are from Australia, you need to get a Bachelors Degree from an accredited university or private college. If you're from the States or Canada, you need a Naturopathic Medical ...
